TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
I present to you, the internet, my creation! Rage014!

-snip-

Rage014 is the 14th iteration of a series of war machines designed to take over the universe and enslave humanity! we're still working on making it more compact. in the future it'll also be in the guise of a seemingly innocent boy with a nervous/silly/egomaniacal personality!

No.

CREEPERBOT WILL PREVENT YOU FROM COMPLETING YOUR OBJECTIVES.

(and it looks so awesome )
Danny Worsnop is so hot.
he wears that long hair well
You're all very much welcome.
Well, there goes the PfL off-topic thread.

Well, there goes the PfL off-topic thread.

Now it will be spit evenly onto this thread and onto the main PfL thread.

Now it will be spit evenly onto this thread and onto the main PfL thread.

Let the chaos ensue (again).
So, Chobit, can you end the debate and tell us your gender or will we be forced to continue arguing?

What's all this about Chobit's gender?

He's a dude, right?

Didn't you see that post that got deleted in the official PfL thread? Something about him being a Nazi too...

What's all this about Chobit's gender?

He's a dude, right?

I've recently given up on what gender Chobit is. All I can presume is that Chobit is a she.
At the least, Chobit is his/her online alter ego which is female.

And no, for the record this thread is not supposed to be for random nonsense and derping around.

It's meant to be a general off topic discussion, for topics that don't really have their own threads. Stuff like the off topic that regularly appears in the PFL thread belongs in this one.
Guys, No chobit discussion. Pick a topic like we have been and keep the thread alive.

Guys, No chobit discussion. Pick a topic like we have been and keep the thread alive.

I don't see why we can't discuss a prominent member here. In the off topic thread.
Okay. Lets talk about the KYOOT BUNNEH picture that Redwolfy (I think) posted. You know, the .gif one?

NEW ICON FOR HIRE ALBUM WHEN

GIMME
Why should I tell anyone when it's much more fun watching you all discuss it xD

Why should I tell anyone when it's much more fun watching you all discuss it xD

Because one day we might destroy the worlds supply of Toblerones?

Or we might bribe you with them, such as a hundred of them? How many do you need to spill that secret?

Toblerones? I love Toblerones. On my way home I bought like 3 big ****-off bars of them.

Was awesome.

That really isn't much of a secret, a better secret to know would be what exactly happened to JFK

(bbl, gotta cut the lawn)

That really isn't much of a secret, a better secret to know would be what exactly happened to JFK

(bbl, gotta cut the lawn)

Edited June 1, 2013 by IvanTehFennec

Oh yeah I didn't tell you guys. I visited my Grandpappy's grave today. It was really sad. I didn't even know him or much about him. All I know is he died in WW2. Apparently shot by a Nazi sniper when he was trying to dress a friends wound.

Morbid.

So, gonna confirm or deny the "accusation" then?

Could we leave the matter alone for the time being? If Chobit does not wish to share it, then it is best to leave it at that and stop pestering people about it.

Besides, the army of lawn care has summoned Chobit to do battle, as so many people must endure this time of year.
Who the hell cuts the grass at half 10 at night anyway?
